name: BRIMONIDINE TARTRATE
indications: Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2% is an alpha adrenergic agonist indicated for lowering intraocular pressure (IOP) in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
contraindications: One drop in the affected eye(s), three times daily, approximately 8 hours apart.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.2% is supplied sterile, in white LDPE Bottle, White LDPE Nozzle with a Purple HDPE Cap in the following sizes: 
                  5 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-231-01
                  10 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-232-01
                  15 mL bottle in one carton – NDC 70069-233-01 
                  
                     Storage: Store at 15o-25oC (59o-77oF).
adverseReactions: Neonates and infants (under the age of 2 years). ( 4.1 )
